wikipedia_page.main: Jean Adebambo (1 July 1962 – 15 January 2009) was a British singer, best known for songs in the lovers rock genre. It is believed she died by suicide.

response: * Jean AdebamboMorris, Davina (2009) "Tributes pour in for lovers rock queen", The Voice, 27 January 2009, retrieved 2012-06-03

In 1975, he relocated to London, England, and became a prominent producer in the lovers rock genre, working with the likes of Carroll Thompson, Jean Adebambo, Trevor Walters, Donna Rhoden, and Lorna Pierre.
*15 January - Jean Adebambo, singer, 46 (suicide)"Jean Adebambo, Brother Confirms Suicide", bamboo.co.uk, 28 January 2009, retrieved 2012-06-05
